description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) class named NoteRequest used for creating or updating notes in a notes application. It includes validation annotations and Swagger schema annotations to facilitate API documentation.

classes.name: NoteRequest
classes.description: A DTO class representing the payload for creating or updating notes, with validation and schema annotations.

methods.name: NoteRequest
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for creating a NoteRequest with specified title and content.
